quoteText:
In general, please be careful and responsible whenever you are online.
Should you choose to voluntarily disclose information through the Services, such as by submitting a question to another user or by answering a question to be posted on your profile, that information can be viewed publicly and people can copy content that is posted on the Internet.
It could also be collected and used by third parties without our or your knowledge, which may result in unsolicited messages from other individuals or third parties.
You should not share personal information that might allow others to contact or locate you or other users, and you should think before you post.
title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

tosdr.case: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online
